DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize use low oxygen concentration resuscitation extremely premature infant avoid oxidative stress derive damage improve outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Oxygen Toxicity Resuscitation Extremely Premature Infants
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective randomize trial enrol premature infant le 28 week gestation . Patients randomly assign become resuscitation initial oxygen inspiratory fraction ( FiO2 ) 30 % 90 % . Main objective reach target saturation 85 % 15 min life . Immediately birth pre-and-postductal pulse oximeter set oxygen saturation ( SpO2 ) continuously monitor register long patient require oxygen supplementation . FiO2 stepwise adjust ( increase decrease 10 % ) every 90 sec accord heart rate , SpO2 responsiveness . Blood sample draw umbilical cord day 1 , 2 7 peripheral vein determine oxidative stress marker ( GSH , GSSG ) , angiogenic factor ( VEGF , VEGF receptor , Angiopoietin ) , pro-inflammatory marker ( IL8 , TNF alfa ) pro-apoptotic marker ( Fas Ligand ; Cytochrome C ) . Urine collect every day first week life determine oxidative stress marker ( 8-oxo-dG ; O-tyrosine ; F2 isoprostanes ; Isofurans ) . Babies follow NICU clinical condition record . Serial examination ROP Auditory evoke potential perform . Neurodevelopmental outcome evaluate 2 year postnatal life . Main outcome : Achievement target saturation 85 % 15 min life . Secondary outcome : acute complication delivery ; chronic complication ( BPD , ROP , IPVH ) ; mortality neonatal period .
DOC.criteria: Prematurity le 28 week gestation Severe malformation Chromosomopathies Informed consent sign
